item.title: Serverless Patterns implemented, part 1
item.description: I think that the best way to learn something is to practice it and to try to explain it, so this is what I’m going to do in the next series of posts. These posts will be based on the amazing article from Jeremy Daly about Serverless Patterns. I’m not going to copy Jeremy’s words here, so for each pattern, go to the article and read it. I’ll provide a technical implementation here and I will mention more resources I found interesting.
